name: Aroumb
description: A healed enemy can be KO'd several times over.
spells: At the end of each of an ally's turns, enemies in line with the ally finishing its turn are healed.

name: Behelit
description: He who seeks only to dominate their adversaries dies with a collar around his neck.
spells: Your opponents' damage is increased 100%.

name: Binar
spells: Each character located on an even cell loses 30% of their HP when an ally ends their turn on an odd cell.

name: Boble
description: You can't taste a Dofus without breaking the shell.
spells: When an opponent dies, their allies gain 200% damage for 2 turns.

name: Corrode
description: Little Tofus fell great oaks.
spells: Opponents apply 40% additional Erosion.

name: Critus
description: A critical mass of massive criticals.
spells: Opponents have a 100% Chance of inflicting Critical Hits.

name: Dagob
description: When well the battle goes, happen the worst does not.
spells: Damage inflicted by your opponents increases 20% per game turn.

name: Dakid
description: He who sleeps with his enemies wakes up dead.
spells: Each attack on a monster attracts all his enemies in a line and diagonally and increases his damage by 20% for 1 turn.

name: Djim
description: He who always fights in the same spot gives up the opportunity to win elsewhere.
spells: Monsters are invulnerable as long as they do not move. Push back damages make them gain 200% damage.

name: Domo
description: Generally speaking, spreading out is a horrible tactic. It's almost as bad as sticking together.
spells: Ending their turn 2 cells or less from an ally gives enemies 1 MP.

name: Dynamo
description: Better hope you can hit a moving target…
spells: Opponents gain 2 MP.

name: Great Behelit
description: He who seeks only to dominate their adversaries dies with a collar around his neck.
spells: Your opponents' damage is increased 400%.

name: Great Boble
description: You can't taste a Dofus without breaking the shell.
spells: When an opponent dies, their allies gain 800% damages for 2 turns.

name: Great Dagob
description: When well the battle goes, happen the worst does not.
spells: Damage inflicted by your opponents increases 80% per game turn.

name: Great Domo
description: Generally speaking, spreading out is a horrible tactic. It's almost as bad as sticking together.
spells: Ending their turn 3 cells or less from an ally gives the enemies 2 MP.

name: Great Dynamo
description: Better hope you can hit a moving target…
spells: Opponents gain 4 MP.

name: Great Horiz
description: When the wiseman points to the horizon, the idiot looks at his finger, and the monster eats the finger. The idiot survives, the wiseman is down a finger, and the monster is hopefully sated.
spells: Your opponents' long range damage is increased 400%.

name: Great Hulhu
description: Fear makes the Gobball run faster than a Tofu.
spells: When an enemy dies, enemies gain 3 MP for 2 turns.

name: Great Kyoub
description: He who underestimates the resistance factor of projectiles when encountering air resistance probably won't make it through winter.
spells: Enemies reduce poison damage and long-distance attacks by 80%.

name: Great Nyoro
description: It's said that it can hypnotize, but no one's really clear how or why it would do that.
spells: Adversaries reflect 100% of damage taken.

name: Great Oaf
description: Keep your distance.
spells: Your opponents' close combat damages are increased 400%.

name: Great Payo
description: There'll always be something to unite those who are worlds apart.
spells: At the end of their turn, enemies attract all the allies located in a Range of 4 cells or more by 2 cells.

name: Great Petunia
description: The harder you are, the bigger you fall.
spells: When an ally suffers damage, their allies located within four cells of them suffer 200% of this damage.

name: Great Pikmi
description: You can't make an omelette without breaking a few eggs.
spells: When an enemy is attacked, 200% of the damage is dealt to allies around the attacker within an area of 4 cells.

name: Great Rocha
description: Whoever's closest is usually wrong. But not by a wrong shot.
spells: At the start of each of an enemy's turns, the character closest to the enemy starting its turn suffers 400% additional damage for 1 turn. Cumulative.

name: Great Sak
description: Whatever doesn't eat you makes you stronger.
spells: Damage inflicted by your opponents increases 800%, then drops by 80% per game turn.

name: Great Teleb
description: Keep your friends far away and your enemies even further.
spells: At the end of their turn, enemies apply a 100% increase in the damage suffered by allies within 6 cells.

name: Great Yosh
description: …then I took an arrow to the heart.
spells:
Long range damage on an enemy increases their damage by 80%.
Stackable 2 times.

name: Great Zaihn
description: The eye of the cyclone is less dangerous than the cyclops' club.
spells: Enemies that die inflict 100% of their HP in damage on anyone 4 or more cells away.

name: Horiz
description: When the wiseman points to the horizon, the idiot looks at his finger, and the monster eats the finger. The idiot survives, the wiseman is down a finger, and the monster is hopefully sated.
spells: Your opponents' long range damage is increased 100%.

name: Hoskar
description: If the enemy is in range, so are you.
spells: Being aligned with an enemy/ally at the end of a turn makes you lose 50% HP for 2 turns.

name: Hulhu
description: Fear makes the Gobball run faster than a Tofu.
spells: When an enemy dies, enemies gain 2 MP for 1 turn.

name: Korria
description: Better hurry it up.
spells: A glyph is placed under each character at the start of the turn. This glyph kills those characters at the end of the turn.

name: Kyoub
description: He who underestimates the resistance factor of projectiles when encountering air resistance probably won't make it through winter.
spells: Enemies reduce poison damage and long-distance attacks by 20%.

name: Meridiawful
description: This idol contains the magic of several Meridia and a fragment of the magic of Sadida himself. However, all this power has a habit of escaping and strengthening your enemies.
spells:
Enemies reduce poison damage and long-distance attacks by 80%.
Enemies that die inflict 100% of their HP in damage on anyone 4 or more cells away.
Opponents kill enemies located on adjacent cells when they die.

name: Muta
description: Keep your friends close and your enemies closer.
spells: If you are not on a cell adjacent to an enemy's cell at the end of the turn, you lose 50% HP.

name: Nahuatl
description: That which is dead may yet be killed.
spells: When an enemy dies, they are automatically resuscitated by the next enemy in initiative order, at the start of its turn.

name: Nekineko
description: Stop touching it!
spells: Opponent gains 1 MP each time they are hit.

name: Nyan
description: Fleeing while backing up is just like giving fierce chase to an escaping enemy. Except in reverse.
spells: Staying on the same cell at the end of a turn makes you lose 50% HP for 2 turns.

name: Nyoro
description: It's said that it can hypnotize, but no one's really clear how or why it would do that.
spells: Adversaries reflect 25% of damage taken.

name: Oaf
description: Keep your distance.
spells: Your opponents' close combat damage is increased 100%.

name: Ougaa
description: Keep your friends close, and get the heck away from your enemies.
spells: If you are on a cell adjacent to an enemy's cell at the end of the turn, you lose 50% HP.

name: Payo
description: There'll always be something to unite those who are worlds apart.
spells: At the end of their turn, the enemies attract all allies located in a Range of 6 or more by 1 cell.

name: Penitent
description: Only a penitent man shall pass.
spells: It is impossible to steal health from your opponents or to heal yourself.

description: The harder you are, the bigger you fall.
spells: When an ally suffers damage, their allies located within two cells of them suffer 100% of these damages.

name: Pikmi
description: You can't make an omelette without breaking a few eggs.
spells: When an enemy is attacked, 100% of the damage is dealt to the allies around the attacker within an area of 3 cells.

name: Proxima
description: Those who leave always take something with them.
spells: Opponents kill enemies located on adjacent cells when they die.

description: Whoever's closest is usually wrong. But not by a wrong shot.
spells: At the start of each of an enemy's turns, the character closest to the enemy starting its turn suffers 100% additional damage for 1 turn. Cumulative.

spells: Damage inflicted by your opponents increases 200%, then drops by 20% per game turn.

name: Teleb
description: Keep your friends far away and your enemies even further.
spells: At the end of their turn, enemies apply a 50% increase in the damage suffered by allies within 4 cells.

name: Ultram
description: For the first time ever, all your enemies want to be in your shoes.
spells: Allies place a glyph at the start of their turn for an unlimited duration. If the enemies start or finish their turn on it, they become invulnerable.

name: Vood
description: If one of your allies is in line with you, he is already dead, he just doesn't know it yet.
spells: At the end of each of an ally's turns, allies in line with the ally finishing its turn suffer damage equivalent to 50% of their HP.

Long range damage on an enemy increases their damage by 20%.
